EmailTemplate.name: 2021 CSAT Action Notes Cycle 2.01-11-22 BNK CSAT Action Note EN.EN Email
EmailTemplate.subject: We are acting on your feedback
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}}, At NCR, we focus on our customers. Your engagement helps us learn and further improve the services and solutions we deliver. We are excited to see a significant and positive trend in our recent Customer Satisfaction Survey results. Understanding that the customer experience revolves around continuous improvement, it is important to share that your feedback directly contributes to helping identify areas for enhancement. Based on the responses we received, we are focusing on the following key areas: - Improve our software support capabilities, incident resolution and response times - Simplify your experience, with an emphasis on service excellence and seamless execution - Standardize our solutions for better distribution, quality and availability - Innovate to create value by extending our digital capabilities and our NCR as a Service offers We aim to drive substantial progress in these and other areas in 2022. Our Customer Satisfaction Survey program will continue, and we invite you to keep providing your valuable feedback. Thank you for being an NCR customer and for sharing your experiences with us. My best, Frank M.
